press_translation_window.description: Press the translation window to ensure it's firmly set

wipe_translation_window.description: Wipe the translation window to ensure it's clean

open_translation_window.description: The window needs to be slid open

close_translation_window.description: The window needs to be slid close

wipe_window_frame.description: Wipe the window frame to ensure it's clean

clean_whole_window.description: Clean the entire window including the translation window and window frame.

depress_whole_window.description: Press the whole window including the translation window and window frame.
